noiDung: Jaws is an American natural horror film series that started with a 1975 film that expanded into three sequels, a theme park ride, and other tie-in merchandise, based on a 1974 novel. The main subject of the saga is a great white shark, and its attacks on people in specific areas of the United States and The Bahamas
theLoai: Drama, Hài Hước, Kịch Tính, Phiêu Lưu

noiDung: Gerry, a former United Nations employee, unexpectedly finds himself in a race against time as he investigates a threatening virus that turns humans into zombies.
theLoai: Zombie, Kinh Dị, Hành Động, Drama, Viễn Tưởng, Kịch Tích

noiDung: Tony Stark encounters a formidable foe called the Mandarin. After failing to defeat his enemy, Tony embarks on a journey of self-discovery as he fights against the powerful Mandarin.
theLoai: Hành Động, Viễn Tưởng, Siêu Anh Hùng

noiDung: Mike and Sulley, two monsters, join Monsters University in order to graduate as the scariest monsters on the planet. While they are arch-rivals, gradually, they become best friends.
theLoai: Hài Hước, Viễn Tưởng, Phiêu Lưu, Hoạt Hình

noiDung: In the primaeval era, Grug and his family risk the dangers of their surroundings to find a new dwelling place. Along the way, they meet a modern boy who woos them with his adventurous ways.
theLoai: Hài Hước, Viễn Tưởng, Phiêu Lưu, Hoạt Hình

noiDung: An amnesiac starts to see the ghost of a lady with blood-filled eyes wandering around her, so she decides to investigate the case.
theLoai: Kinh Dị, Kịch Tính, Giật Gân
